Review Text: This cleansing lotion has a runny consistency. One needs to apply a small amount on wet skin and massage in soft circular motion for a minute or so. In this way it takes away the layer of excessive oil as well as impurities sitting on top of the skin. Once washed off it unleashes soft and clean skin which does not feel dry at all. One can follow with a light moisturizer and makeup as per their wish. As promised it cleanses gently without dehydrating and being soap free it can be used several times a day.

Product Name: Episoft Cleansing Lotion is one of the best cleansers for not just sensitive but all skin types. In fact its quite close to Cetaphil cleansing lotion but I find Episoft works better for me. Instantly it helps get rid of accumulated dirt from the pores which otherwise leads to severe breakouts. Similarly it calms down dry and sun sensitive skin but it is not actually very foamy or deep cleansing which might be an issue for oily beauties.Neither does it control oil nor aid in mattifying skin. However
Rating: most foamy washes are usually quite hard and strip off natural oils of the skin. Thus I would highly recommend for sensitive as well as irritated skin which needs constant care.

column6:
I've tried numerous deodorants, but Fogg stands out from the rest! Its unique formula provides an incredible 48-hour protection against sweat and body odor. The fragrance is amazing, and the scent lasts all day without fading.

What I love most about Fogg is its ability to keep me feeling fresh and confident, even on the most hectic days. The application is smooth, and the packaging is convenient for on-the-go use.

I've noticed a significant reduction in sweat stains and embarrassing odor moments since switching to Fogg. It's perfect for daily use, workouts, or special occasions.

Overall, Fogg deodorant has exceeded my expectations, and I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a reliable and effective deodorant.

column5: this product is designed to work effectively without causing any adverse reactions. However

Product Name: **Effect on Skin:**
1. **Acne Treatment:** Salicylic acid
Rating: typically found in concentrations around 0.5% to 2% in such products
Review Text: helps exfoliate the skin and penetrate pores to clear out debris. This makes it effective in treating acne and preventing future breakouts.

Product Name: 2. **Oil Control:** It can help regulate oil production
Rating: which is beneficial for individuals with oily skin types.

Product Name: 3. **Exfoliation:** Salicylic acid is a beta hydroxy acid (BHA) known for its exfoliating properties
Rating: aiding in removing dead skin cells and promoting smoother skin texture.

Product Name: **Review:**
- **Pros:** Users often appreciate its ability to effectively cleanse the skin without over-drying
Rating: thanks to its balanced formulation. It tends to leave the skin feeling clean and refreshed.

Product Name: - **Cons:** Some individuals with sensitive skin may find it too drying or irritating
Rating: especially if used too frequently or in high concentrations. It's generally recommended to start with a lower concentration and gradually increase usage if well-tolerated.

Product Name: **Overall:** The Salicylic Acid Derma Co Face Wash is well-suited for oily and acne-prone skin types seeking an effective cleanser to manage breakouts and excess oil. However
Rating: individuals with sensitive skin should approach with caution or consider patch testing first. Always follow up with moisturizer and sunscreen

Review Text: I have never experienced such a disastrous skincare product before
Reviewer Name: and The Derma Co 1% Salicylic Acid Gel Face Wash With Salicylic Acid & Witch Hazel For Active Acne Face Wash takes the cake for being the worst face wash I have ever used. I bought this product with the hope of achieving clearer and healthier skin
column6: it has wreaked havoc on my face
column7: causing severe acne and damaging my once-glowing complexion.

Product Name: Firstly
Rating: the ingredients in this face wash seem to be a cocktail of harsh chemicals that irritated my skin from the very first use. Upon application
Reviewer Name: which should have been my first warning sign to stop using it immediately. However
column5: I naively thought that this was just my skin getting used to the product and decided to persist for a few more days. Big mistake.

Product Name: As days passed
Rating: my skin became progressively worse. Not only did I experience an onslaught of painful acne
Review Text: but my face also started to feel dry and tight. I developed dry patches and flakiness
Reviewer Name: which was entirely uncharacteristic of my skin type. It seemed as though the face wash had stripped away all the natural oils and left my skin defenseless against environmental aggressors.

Product Name: I continued using this Face Wash in the hope that things would improve over time
Review Text: it only worsened the situation. Not only did my acne persist
Reviewer Name: but it started leaving behind stubborn marks and scars that were impossible to ignore. My complexion looked dull
column6: and far from the radiant appearance I had before using this product.

Product Name: To make matters worse
Rating: the product claimed to be suitable for all skin types
Review Text: which is undoubtedly not the case. I now suspect that this face wash is best suited for those with extremely oily and resilient skin
Reviewer Name: but for anyone with even slightly sensitive or dry skin

column5: and shattered confidence. I urge anyone considering this product to exercise extreme caution and perform a patch test before incorporating it into their skincare routine. I

column8: boasting a potent blend of Niacinamide
column11: promises a radiant and even complexion. Let's break down what these ingredients can potentially do for your skin:

Product Name: Niacinamide: Known for its ability to reduce redness
Vitamin E: A potent antioxidant that helps protect the skin from damage and keeps it hydrated.
Kojic Acid: Often used to lighten dark spots and improve skin tone.
Potential Benefits:
Based on the ingredients
Brighten and even out skin tone
Reduce the appearance of dark spots and pigmentation
Improve skin texture and hydration
Protect the skin from environmental damage
Cautions:
While these ingredients are generally safe
Rating: it's essential to consider the following:

Product Name: Sensitivity: Some individuals might experience skin irritation or allergic reactions to these ingredients.
Sun Protection: Using products with brightening ingredients often requires diligent sun protection to prevent new dark spots.
Consistency: Results may vary
Rating: and consistent use is usually necessary to see significant improvements.

Product Name: Overall:
The Dermatouch Bright & Even Tone Face Wash appears to be a promising product with ingredients that can potentially benefit many skin types. However
Rating: individual results may vary. It's crucial to patch test any new skincare product before full application and to follow the recommended usage instructions.

Review Text: I recently added the Neutrogena Deep Clean Facial Cleanser to my skincare routine
Reviewer Name: and it has quickly become a favorite. Tailored for normal to oily skin
column5: this cleanser delivers on its promises with remarkable results.

Product Name: The gel formula feels incredibly refreshing on the skin
Rating: providing a deep cleanse that removes impurities and excess oil without over-drying. The 200ml size is generous
Review Text: and a little goes a long way
Reviewer Name: making it an economical choice for a daily cleanser.

Product Name: One of the standout features is the invigorating sensation it leaves after use. It's like a burst of freshness that wakes up my skin
Rating: leaving it feeling revitalized and thoroughly cleansed. The formula is non-comedogenic
Review Text: which is a big win for those with sensitive or acne-prone skin.

Product Name: I've noticed a visible improvement in the overall texture of my skin since incorporating this cleanser into my routine. It effectively tackles stubborn blackheads and leaves my complexion looking clearer and more radiant.

Neutrogena Deep Clean Gentle Facial Cleanser | 2x Glycerin & Cleansing Agent | Alcohol-Free | Dermatologist Tested | Normal to Oily Skin | For Men and Women | 200ml
Reviewer Name: I have finally found the best pair of products for oily skin.

Product Name: Packaging: All three products came nicely and securely packed. The bottles are also designed for convenience as the push drop bottle produces the appropriate amount of face wash and moisturizer and even the suncream has a small opening to eject the appropriate amount of cream.
Product:

a. Facewash: The face wash is nice and light. It creates a good amount of foam and removes almost all the dirt and oil from the face leaving the face moist and clear. The face wash has a mild rose fragrance but does not irritate the nose. The face wash used twice a day lasts for 30 Days.

b. Moisturizer: The moisturizer is the star product of the pack. It is very light and easily applies to the skin. It leaves the skin oil-free moist and healthy feeling all day long. The best part is the moisturizer does leave an oily dark face. The moisturizer used twice a day lasts for 2 months. (I use only one pump every time)
c. Suncream: Suncream is also amazing and lightweight. It applies really well to the face and unlike many creams in the market
Rating: it also does not leave a dark oily looking face. The Suncream used twice a day lasts for 2 months (I use only a peanut-sized cream every time)

Product Name: Price: The price range is also fine with all the three items coming in just Rs. 719
Although this month I am trying Cipla Saslic Ds Foaming Face Wash 60 ml (Pack of 2)
Rating: from LifeLine Medicos as a face wash and Neutrogena's Moisturizer and suncream.

column7: I was looking for a pha toner for a really long time since I have dry and sensetive skin and AHAs and BHAs are kinda harsh on my skin. Also PHA is a great form of exfoliator for skin of colour as we are very prone to burns and marks due to high melanin production in our skin+ it takes some time to get rid of marks or pigmentation on our skin.

Product Name: (Info- how to check if you fall in the category of skin of colour or not? If you tan easily then you fall under the category of skin of colour and if you get red easily then you will under the category of white)
Texture- watery
Feel- once you apply it.It leaves your skin kinda moist
Rating: hyderated and smooth I'd say.It also looks watery but once you apply it
Review Text: it feels like you applied a viscous toner.

Product Name: Final thoughts- as I said I'll be updating the review after using it for a month am a very stingy when it comes to skincare so here is the thing my mom and I have been using it on a daily basis for 1month.My skin has been loving it since then. I haven't yet faced any problem with this.Toners are not an essential step to the skin care I cannot say that I have seen a huge difference in my skin but this has been a blessing for my dry skin. Sometimes even the gentelest cleanser dry's out my skin but this provides a very good first step hyderation to my skin. I am also very sensitive to smell this product has no additional fragrance but once you take it out on your hand and try to smell you.It has a very mild smell somewhat chemically but once you apply it their is no smell.
Cons- I kinda don't like the packaging I think it could've been better it doesn't looks very travel friendly
But overall I like this proudct üëç‚ù§Ô∏è

column5: I have been using Wishcare Kannauj Rose Water for the past month
column6: and I am thoroughly impressed with its quality and effectiveness. As someone who has tried various rose waters
column7: I can confidently say this one stands out for several reasons.

Product Name: Pros:
Pure and Natural: The first thing I noticed was the purity of this rose water. It is made from Kannauj roses
Rating: known for their superior quality. There are no added chemicals or artificial fragrances
Review Text: making it gentle on the skin.

Product Name: Refreshing: A spritz of this rose water instantly refreshes my face
Rating: providing a cooling effect that is perfect for hot days or after a tiring day.

Product Name: Hydrating: It hydrates my skin beautifully
Rating: leaving it soft and supple. I use it as a toner after cleansing
Review Text: and it preps my skin perfectly for the next steps in my skincare routine.

Product Name: Versatile: Apart from using it as a toner
Rating: I also mix it with my face masks for added benefits. Sometimes
Review Text: I even use it to set my makeup

Product Name: Lovely Packaging: The bottle is sturdy and the spray mechanism works well
Rating: dispensing a fine mist without any wastage.

Product Name: Cons:
Scent: While I appreciate the natural fragrance of roses
Rating: some might find the scent a bit too strong. However
Review Text: it fades quickly and doesn't linger.

Product Name: Price: It is slightly on the pricier side compared to other rose waters available in the market. However
Review Text: I believe it's worth the investment.

Product Name: Overall
Rating: I am extremely satisfied with Wishcare Kannauj Rose Water. It has become a staple in my skincare routine
Review Text: and I love how it makes my skin feel. If you're looking for a natural and effective rose water
Reviewer Name: I highly recommend giving this one a try!

column7: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Khadi Pure Wild Rose Water for Deep Hydration with Desi Gulaab
column8: and I must say that I am thoroughly impressed with its performance. This product claims to provide deep hydration while utilizing the natural benefits of desi gulaab (wild rose) water
column9: and it certainly delivers on its promises.

Product Name: Firstly
Rating: let's talk about the packaging. The rose water comes in a sturdy and attractive bottle with a convenient spray nozzle. The bottle is well-sealed
Review Text: ensuring that the product remains fresh and uncontaminated. The spray nozzle allows for easy application and helps distribute the product evenly on the skin.

Product Name: The fragrance of this rose water is simply divine. It has a beautiful
Rating: natural aroma of roses that is not overpowering but rather subtle and pleasant. It instantly uplifts the senses and provides a soothing effect. It's a delight to use
Review Text: especially during those hot summer days when you need a refreshing pick-me-up.

Product Name: In terms of hydration
Rating: this product truly delivers. The wild rose water is known for its hydrating properties
Review Text: and I can attest to its effectiveness. I have dry skin
Reviewer Name: and after using this rose water regularly
column5: I noticed a significant improvement in the overall hydration of my skin. It leaves my skin feeling soft
column8: without any greasiness or stickiness. It also helps to balance the pH level of the skin
column9: leaving it looking healthy and radiant.

Product Name: Another impressive aspect of this rose water is its versatility. Besides being a great hydrating toner
Rating: it can also be used as a facial mist
Reviewer Name: or mixed with other skincare products like face masks or serums. I have tried using it in different ways
column5: and it has always provided a refreshing and rejuvenating effect.

Product Name: One notable highlight of this product is its use of desi gulaab or wild rose water. Khadi has sourced the rose water from indigenous roses
Rating: which are known to have higher levels of beneficial compounds. This adds an extra layer of authenticity and quality to the product.

Product Name: I appreciate that Khadi is a brand known for its commitment to using natural and organic ingredients
Rating: and this product is no exception. It is free from harmful chemicals
column5: making it suitable for all skin types

Product Name: In conclusion
Rating: the Khadi Pure Wild Rose Water for Deep Hydration with Desi Gulaab is a remarkable product that lives up to its claims. It provides deep hydration
Reviewer Name: and is versatile in its usage. If you're looking for a natural and effective rose water that will leave your skin hydrated and rejuvenated
column5: I highly recommend giving this product a try

Product Name: The Oradinaray Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution
Reviewer Name: I use this on my oily
column5: dandruff prone scalp once in 2 weeks. I use it on underarms once a week. Both uses have been very beneficial. Hair use makes the hair feel squeaky clean and get rid of build up. Underarm use has felt good and less stinky but no noticeable difference in terms of lightening. Planning to start using it on arms for treating keratosis polaris or strawberry skin. On the second bottle now. Overall recommend it for any non face exfoliation. Keep in mind it has a very watery consistency and is a strong product. So be careful of it trickling down your face if applying to scalp or trickling down to a wound/cut from where you apply it. Using it with a cotton round when using on skin helps. Applying in small quantities with the head tilted back or with a absorbent head band at the forehead helps when applying to the scalp.

Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Lotion 354ml (for Normal and Dry Skin)
Delivery Speed: It arrived 1 day late.
Courier used by seller: On Dot Courier
Expiry date: 5 months from now (Apr 2016)
The Product (Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Lotion): These is a very good lotion for dry skin whether you are dealing only with dry skin or conditions like Eczema
Rating: Psoriasis etc. It is fragrance free and that is an absolute must when dealing with any type of skin ailment. The Oatmeal is indeed calming and soothing to the skin. The pump dispenser ensures that the product stays hygienic and is not wasted either. The consistency of the lotion is between a typical watery lotion like Cetaphil and a good cream like Cerave. it is just right - neither watery nor too thick. That ensures that it stays on your skin long enough to keep it moisturized without feeling heavy or tacky. Dimethicone is a form of an OTC silicone that is indeed a skin protectant. It is missing any fancy ingredients like Ceramides or Hyaluronic Acid that are rather helpful for compromised skin. their Aveeno Eczema Relief cream is almost the same formula as this one with a Ceramide added to the list. So
Review Text: if you are considering an Aveeno lotion for an infant/child with Eczema
Reviewer Name: that is a better option. However
column5: if you are a grown up like me who also uses prescription ointments/creams periodically to manage their skin condition & need a good day time body moisturizer to keep the skin hydrated & calm at a very low price

Rating: the close expiry made me deduct 1 star.

Reviewer Name: I can provide some general information about the ingredients in the WOW Skin Science Shea Butter and Cocoa Butter Moisturizing Body Lotion. Please note that individual reactions to cosmetic products can vary
column5: and it's essential to perform a patch test if you have sensitive skin or specific allergies. Here's an overview of the ingredients:

Product Name: 1. **Purified Water:** This is the base for the lotion.
2. **Cetyl Alcohol:** This is a fatty alcohol commonly used in cosmetic products as an emollient and emulsifier.
3. **Dicaprylyl Carbonate:** It is a synthetic emollient used to help soften and smooth the skin.
4. **Glyceryl Monostearate:** An emulsifier that helps blend water and oil-based ingredients in the lotion.
5. **Isopropyl Myristate:** An emollient that can help make the skin feel smooth.
6. **Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides:** These are derived from coconut oil and are used as emollients in skincare products.
7. **Isoamyl Laurate:** A skin-conditioning agent that can help improve the spreadability of the lotion.
8. **Shea Butter and Cocoa Butter:** These are natural butters known for their moisturizing properties.
9. **Sodium PCA:** A naturally occurring humectant that helps to retain moisture in the skin.
10. **Betaine Anhydrous:** A humectant and anti-irritant that helps maintain skin hydration.
11. **Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract:** This extract may contain antioxidants and vitamins beneficial for the skin.
12. **Moroccan Argan Oil and Sweet Almond Oil:** These are natural oils that can provide additional moisture and nourishment to the skin.
13. **Aloe Vera Extract:** Aloe vera is known for its soothing and hydrating properties.
14. **D Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5):** This is a provitamin of B5 that is used to moisturize and condition the skin.
15. **Fragrance:** Fragrances are added to provide a pleasant scent. If you have sensitive skin
16. **Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid):** This is known for its ability to retain water and provide hydration to the skin.
17. **Allantoin:** Allantoin is often used for its soothing and skin-conditioning properties.
18. **Disodium EDTA:** It is a chelating agent used to stabilize and preserve the product.
19. **Sodium Benzoate and Phenoxyethanol:** These are preservatives used to prevent the growth of harmful microorganisms in the product.
20. **Ethylhexylglycerin:** A skin-conditioning agent that can also function as a preservative.
Overall
Rating: many of the ingredients listed are commonly found in skincare products and are generally considered safe for use. However
Reviewer Name: so if you have sensitive skin or specific allergies
column5: it's a good idea to perform a patch test and discontinue use if you experience any adverse reactions. If you have specific concerns or skin conditions
column6: it's always a good idea to consult with a dermatologist.

Product Name: Dove Body Love Nourished Radiance Body Lotion For Very Dry Skin 48hrs Moisturisation Paraben Free with Plant Based moisturiser Soft Radiant Skin 400ml
Review Text: Since the time I have understood my skin type
Reviewer Name: I can surely say that I have very dry skin and it's extremely sensitive. As soon as winters approach I start worrying about my skin care. My skin goes bit scaly and in turn amounts to lot of itching during winters. No matter how much oil or any moisturizing lotion I apply on my skin
column5: everything just vanishes in 1 or 2 hours making my skin look dull again. But now all my worries has taken the back seat since I have started using Dove's nourished radiance rich body lotion. First of all it's very light weight and easy to apply. It quickly absorbs into your skin. This body lotion keeps my skin hydrated for longest hours I can imagine. I have never experienced my skin looking hydrated for almost 12 hours considering the fact my skin is extremely dry. It immediately gives the smooth and soft texture feeling to my skin. The most important thing and the biggest plus point for me is that it smells heaven. The fragrance is very subtle and it gives a refreshing sense. It's been a while that I am using this and I am very happy with this product.

Product Name: WOW Skin Science Shea Butter With Lactic Acid Body Lotion | Hydrates Very Dry Skin | Long Lasting 48 hrs Moisturization | Smoothens Rough
Reviewer Name: I can provide some general information about the ingredients in the WOW Skin Science Shea Butter and Cocoa Butter Moisturizing Body Lotion. Please note that individual reactions to cosmetic products can vary
column5: and it's essential to perform a patch test if you have sensitive skin or specific allergies. Here's an overview of the ingredients:

Product Name: 1. **Purified Water:** This is the base for the lotion.
2. **Cetyl Alcohol:** This is a fatty alcohol commonly used in cosmetic products as an emollient and emulsifier.
3. **Dicaprylyl Carbonate:** It is a synthetic emollient used to help soften and smooth the skin.
4. **Glyceryl Monostearate:** An emulsifier that helps blend water and oil-based ingredients in the lotion.
5. **Isopropyl Myristate:** An emollient that can help make the skin feel smooth.
6. **Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides:** These are derived from coconut oil and are used as emollients in skincare products.
7. **Isoamyl Laurate:** A skin-conditioning agent that can help improve the spreadability of the lotion.
8. **Shea Butter and Cocoa Butter:** These are natural butters known for their moisturizing properties.
9. **Sodium PCA:** A naturally occurring humectant that helps to retain moisture in the skin.
10. **Betaine Anhydrous:** A humectant and anti-irritant that helps maintain skin hydration.
11. **Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract:** This extract may contain antioxidants and vitamins beneficial for the skin.
12. **Moroccan Argan Oil and Sweet Almond Oil:** These are natural oils that can provide additional moisture and nourishment to the skin.
13. **Aloe Vera Extract:** Aloe vera is known for its soothing and hydrating properties.
14. **D Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5):** This is a provitamin of B5 that is used to moisturize and condition the skin.
15. **Fragrance:** Fragrances are added to provide a pleasant scent. If you have sensitive skin
16. **Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid):** This is known for its ability to retain water and provide hydration to the skin.
17. **Allantoin:** Allantoin is often used for its soothing and skin-conditioning properties.
18. **Disodium EDTA:** It is a chelating agent used to stabilize and preserve the product.
19. **Sodium Benzoate and Phenoxyethanol:** These are preservatives used to prevent the growth of harmful microorganisms in the product.
20. **Ethylhexylglycerin:** A skin-conditioning agent that can also function as a preservative.
Overall
Rating: many of the ingredients listed are commonly found in skincare products and are generally considered safe for use. However
Reviewer Name: so if you have sensitive skin or specific allergies
column5: it's a good idea to perform a patch test and discontinue use if you experience any adverse reactions. If you have specific concerns or skin conditions
column6: it's always a good idea to consult with a dermatologist.

column5: For the past several years I have had moderate redness on my cheeks and chin
column6: even with using gentle cleansers and moisturizing. My mom has rosacea so it's possible that's in my genes. I always had to cover up this redness with concealer but it bummed me out that I didn't feel confident without makeup on. Fast forward to buying this product and using it for about a month-- my inflammation/red patches are basically gone and my skin tone is so much more even! Another huge plus: because this product has drastically reduced the inflammation
column7: it has also reduced the appearance of the red pigmentation from my acne scars. They look WAY less pronounced now and I'm amazed! Using this product has really increased my confidence when leaving the house without makeup. My skin looks healthier and is more moisturized. It is also an excellent addition to my morning gua sha routine because of its slippery texture. I use the product twice a day on my face and neck and am SO happy it has made such a difference in my skin... Buy it!!

column5: For the past several years I have had moderate redness on my cheeks and chin
column6: even with using gentle cleansers and moisturizing. My mom has rosacea so it's possible that's in my genes. I always had to cover up this redness with concealer but it bummed me out that I didn't feel confident without makeup on. Fast forward to buying this product and using it for about a month-- my inflammation/red patches are basically gone and my skin tone is so much more even! Another huge plus: because this product has drastically reduced the inflammation
column7: it has also reduced the appearance of the red pigmentation from my acne scars. They look WAY less pronounced now and I'm amazed! Using this product has really increased my confidence when leaving the house without makeup. My skin looks healthier and is more moisturized. It is also an excellent addition to my morning gua sha routine because of its slippery texture. I use the product twice a day on my face and neck and am SO happy it has made such a difference in my skin... Buy it!!

Review Text: This product works. Anyone who decides to use Retinol should definitely do some research (I recommend the YouTube channel Doctorly) before using the product. I‚Äôve seen some criticisms in the reviews here about breakouts and people finding the formula to be too oily. I‚Äôll try and address both points here:

Product Name: 1. Your face will probably break out when you first start using Retinol. The product increases the cell turnover of your skin
Rating: leading to something called ‚Äúpurging‚Äù. Trust me
Review Text: stick it out for at least a month or two

Product Name: Of course
Rating: any redness or breakouts could also be a sign of a bad reaction to Retinol. You‚Äôll know that‚Äôs the case of you see breakouts in parts of your face that normally don‚Äôt have acne. If that‚Äôs the case
Review Text: just reduce the frequency of Retinol usage in the first months (once every two or three days should do) and sandwich the product between layers of a moisturiser.

Product Name: 2. The formula IS oil-based. It has to be for the active ingredient to be stable. I understand that it feels weird going to bed with your skin looking oily
Rating: but just trust the process. And if you really feel like it‚Äôs leaving your face feeling too greasy
Review Text: reduce the amount of product that you‚Äôre using (5-7 drops is more than enough to cover the face and neck)

Product Name: My only criticism about the product has to do with the packaging. It would be really good if Minimalist started putting seals on their boxes
Rating: so that the consumers can be assured that the product they‚Äôve purchased hasn‚Äôt been tampered with.

Review Text: This product works. Anyone who decides to use Retinol should definitely do some research (I recommend the YouTube channel Doctorly) before using the product. I‚Äôve seen some criticisms in the reviews here about breakouts and people finding the formula to be too oily. I‚Äôll try and address both points here:

Product Name: 1. Your face will probably break out when you first start using Retinol. The product increases the cell turnover of your skin
Rating: leading to something called ‚Äúpurging‚Äù. Trust me
Review Text: stick it out for at least a month or two

Product Name: Of course
Rating: any redness or breakouts could also be a sign of a bad reaction to Retinol. You‚Äôll know that‚Äôs the case of you see breakouts in parts of your face that normally don‚Äôt have acne. If that‚Äôs the case
Review Text: just reduce the frequency of Retinol usage in the first months (once every two or three days should do) and sandwich the product between layers of a moisturiser.

Product Name: 2. The formula IS oil-based. It has to be for the active ingredient to be stable. I understand that it feels weird going to bed with your skin looking oily
Rating: but just trust the process. And if you really feel like it‚Äôs leaving your face feeling too greasy
Review Text: reduce the amount of product that you‚Äôre using (5-7 drops is more than enough to cover the face and neck)

Product Name: My only criticism about the product has to do with the packaging. It would be really good if Minimalist started putting seals on their boxes
Rating: so that the consumers can be assured that the product they‚Äôve purchased hasn‚Äôt been tampered with.

BHT ‚Äì Chances are you have heard of a toxic chemical being removed from many nail polishes on the market called toluene. BHT is essentially substituted toluene. It is harmful. According to the National Library of Medicine HazMap
Rating: BHT is considered to me a "known immune system toxicant." Animal studies have also shown that in low doses
Review Text: that BHT causes negative effects to the brain and nervous system. This study was published by the Journal of Medicinal Chemistry in 1980 and has yet to be refuted. There is a host of bans and restrictions on BHT across the globe
Reviewer Name: yet it is still used here. What troubles me most is that Bio-Oil is used by many pregnant women on stretch marks and one has to wonder about the effect it may have on unborn children.

Reviewer Name: Good for sensitive skin and keeps skin supple and glowing.

Product Name: The Man Company 40% Vitamin C Face Serum With Hyaluronic Acid | Boosts Collagen | Glowing & Brightening Skin | Soft
Reviewer Name: Overall a very nice serum to use. The texture easily absorbs into the skin and has a slight fragrance however I think its mainly from the serval botanical extracts. One of the primary ingredients in this serum is niacinamides (Vitamin B3) and this does help with things like rosacea
column6: age lines. The vitamin C in the product sat at 15th position which I felt was strange for what claims to be a 40% vitamin C (Sodium ascorbyl phosphate for anyone curious of the vitamin c source) after a week of using I've not really noticed a difference going form a 23% vitamin C in which the active ascorbic acid (vitamin c) sits as the second ingredients. This serum making me question the strength of the serum I don't believe its at 40% as the product simply doesn't feel strong enough (Vitamin C in high dosage tingles on the skin) and after using twice a day for a week I'm pretty confident this is a niacinamide serum (the primary active ingredient) with some Vitamin C. A nice serum however mislabelled and being miss sold.

Product Name: I am not going to be a repeat customer.

Product Name: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence 3.38 fl.oz 100ml
Rating: Hydrating Serum for Face with Snail Secretion Filtrate for Dull Skin & Fine Lines
column5: For the past several years I have had moderate redness on my cheeks and chin
column6: even with using gentle cleansers and moisturizing. My mom has rosacea so it's possible that's in my genes. I always had to cover up this redness with concealer but it bummed me out that I didn't feel confident without makeup on. Fast forward to buying this product and using it for about a month-- my inflammation/red patches are basically gone and my skin tone is so much more even! Another huge plus: because this product has drastically reduced the inflammation
column7: it has also reduced the appearance of the red pigmentation from my acne scars. They look WAY less pronounced now and I'm amazed! Using this product has really increased my confidence when leaving the house without makeup. My skin looks healthier and is more moisturized. It is also an excellent addition to my morning gua sha routine because of its slippery texture. I use the product twice a day on my face and neck and am SO happy it has made such a difference in my skin... Buy it!!

I always had to cover up this redness with concealer but it bummed me out that I didn't feel confident without makeup on. Fast forward to buying this product and using it for about a month-- my inflammation/red patches are basically gone and my skin tone is so much more even! Another huge plus: because this product has drastically reduced the inflammation
column7: it has also reduced the appearance of the red pigmentation from my acne scars. They look WAY less pronounced now and I'm amazed! Using this product has really increased my confidence when leaving the house without makeup. My skin looks healthier and is more moisturized. It is also an excellent addition to my morning gua sha routine because of its slippery texture. I use the product twice a day on my face and neck and am SO happy it has made such a difference in my skin... Buy it!!

Reviewer Name: I usually like the Lacto Calamine products since they are sensitive on the skin and do not cause any damages. I regularly use the Cleansing Toner
column5: the 10% Niacinamide and the Vitamin C Serums and the Green Tea Night Gel Moisturizer and have been liking it. I recently bought the Lacto Calamine Sunscreen lotion. Unlike the brand claims
column6: the lotion is greasy and does not leave a matte finish on the skin. It is a mammoth task to get the lotion to blend into the skin and will easily take about five minutes of working to get it absorbed. I bought this water-resistant lotion to use it for my morning jogs. But I manage to get myself a mini workout just applying and blending the lotion into the skin before stepping out for the jog. Mine is a combination to oily skin type and I have to top this lotion application with a sunscreen powder or a compact to get the matte finish look. The label claims that it is suitable for oily skin people
column7: but it doesn't work for me. Those with oily skin and living in humid weather conditions like in Mumbai
column8: you may want to give it a pass unless you have the patience
column9: endurance and the time to get this lotion to blend into the skin.

column5: OMG! I am a beauty fanatic and have tons of lotions and potions. I have used Lancome
column6: Clinique and ROC but this product from Biotique is 100% better! Let me explain why...First I am 34 years old and still have some acne scars from when I was in my teens. I am olive complected & have tried almost every dark skin corrector out there but nothing worked! Clinique's Dark Spot Corrector was a dud & I was swindled out of $49.50! That product did nothing for my skin. This Biotique lotion drastically faded my scars and I have only been using it for a few days! I have also noticed that my skin is smoother and my pores are practically invisible. I also love the herbal smell of this product and appreciate that this is a natural
column7: ayurvedic product. This product is pretty cheap but you are really getting a steal because of how this lotion packs such a powerful punch. LOVE it!! I would definitely buy this product again from this seller.
